Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file

Class FileHTTPServer

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Connector
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Server
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.HTTPServer
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file.FileHTTPServer
public class FileHTTPServer extends HTTPServer
HTTP connector for serving files from a filesystem root. This replaces the older FileBasedHTTPConnector.
Author:
Chris Burdess
